main.name: Dream Services
main.description: Dream Services is a Leading Freelance company that provides courses to help people Learn how to earn money with their creative skills. The courses are designed for creative entrepreneurs, small business owners, and professionals who want to take control of their careers by building a successful side hustle or full-time business. Dream Services believes in the power of collaboration and community, giving members access to lots of resources including exclusive discounts on services like web hosting. Dream Services is committed to helping creatives make more money doing what they love while also finding fulfillment in their work life balance.
main.bio: Through this initiative, We will help young people to earn sustainable income. One of the main goals of this project is to provide youth training opportunities for self-employment using Internet-based freelance work. This wise movement by our Honest Team members will accelerate the entrepreneurial skills of about 10,000 people a year which will ultimately help them earn a decent living. This program is not just a training program but a revolution that will help create dream jobs and prepare our Users for the future of work race around the world.
